module.name: yarpOpenPose
module.description: This yarp module is configured to estimate human pose based on OpenPose, a library for real-time multi-person keypoint detection and multi-threading.
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long:
This yarp module is configured to estimate human pose based on OpenPose, a library for real-time multi-person keypoint detection and multi-threading. It makes use of Caffe and OpenCV.
\image html yarpOpenPose.png "yarpOpenPose at work"

param.desc: To specify the module's name; all the open ports will be tagged with the prefix /name

output.description: Stream out an image with the result of the pose estimation.
Stream out a yarp list containing the poses of each bodypart (string Xpos Ypos Confidence).
